#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <cstring>




using namespace std;



int c;
const int MAXN = 100000;
vector <int> a[MAXN];
bool v[MAXN];

void dfs(int u) {
	int w;
	for (int i = 0; i < a[u].size(); i += 1) {
		w = a[u][i];
		if (!v[w]) {
			v[w] = true;
			dfs(w);
		}
	}
}

int main() {
	#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
		freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
	#endif
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while (t--) {
		int n, e;
		memset(v, false, sizeof v);
		c = 0;
		scanf("%d %d", &n, &e);
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1) {
			a[i].clear();
		}
		while (e--) {
			int u, v;
			scanf("%d %d", &u, &v);
			a[u].push_back(v);
			a[v].push_back(u);
		}
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i += 1) {
			if (!v[i]) {
				v[i] = true;
				dfs(i);
				c += 1;
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n", c);
	}
	return 0;
}
